context_type.description: Deprecated, this data is contained within the authentication token.

context_id.description: Deprecated, this data is contained within the authentication token. Required when context_type is filled.

user_id.description: Deprecated, this data is contained within the authentication token. Prohibited when context_type = module_session.

organisation_id.description: Deprecated, this data is contained within the authentication token. Prohibited when context_type = module_session, battle_session, direct_play or daily_challenge.

micro_game_id.description: Deprecated, this data is contained within the authentication token. Prohibited when context_type = module_session, battle_session, direct_play or daily_challenge.

integration.description: Deprecated, this data is contained within the authentication token. Omit if app score is not made through an integration.

user.description: The user the knowledge category activity is associated with.

organisation.description: The organisation the knowledge category activity is associated with. Required when no module session is provided.

module_session.description: The module session the knowledge category activity is associated with. Required when no user and organisation are provided.

organisation_id.description: The ID of the organisation to which the module sessions belong.

user_id.description: The ID of the user who played the module sessions.

challenge_grouping.description: Unique identifier to relate module sessions to a new challenge session that has not been created yet.

introduction.description: Introduction text on the dashboard. Some basic HTML element are allowed.

file.description: The zip file containing the results of the Take-away session.

language.description: Preferred languages of the user in order of preference.

first.description: The URL to the first page

last.description: The URL to the last page

prev.description: The URL to the previous page, or null if there is no previous page

next.description: The URL to the next page, or null if there is no next page

from.description: The index of the first item on the current page

url.description: The URL to the page, or null if there is no page i.e. when on the first page as there might be no previous/next page

label.description: The name of the button to navigate to the page

page.description: The page number, or null if there is no page i.e. when on the first page as there might be no previous/next page

active.description: Whether or not this link can be visited

path.description: The base URL for the resource

per_page.description: The number of items per page

to.description: The index of the last item on the current page

total.description: The total number of items available

background_mobile_image.description: If null, background_image should be used

background_tablet_image.description: If null, background_image should be used

background_desktop_image.description: If null, background_image should be used

introduction.description: Introduction text on the dashboard. Some basic HTML element are allowed.

language.description: Preferred languages of the user in order of preference.
